titleStmt.title: Act appointing collectors of shires to receive clipped merk-pieces from the parish-collectors of the pole-money, and ordaining diligence against parish-collectors. Edinburgh, January 28, 1696.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
